description: Schema for the dev.ocs.cart.multi_store@1.0 capability. Its presence indicates the server supports carts containing items from multiple stores.

maxStoresPerCart.description: The maximum number of different stores that can be represented in a single cart. If omitted, there is no limit.

taxCalculation.description: How taxes are calculated for multi-store carts. 'per_store' means taxes are calculated separately for each store's items. 'combined' means taxes are calculated on the combined cart total.

shippingCalculation.description: How shipping costs are calculated. 'per_store' means separate shipping per store. 'combined' means a single combined shipping cost. 'optimized' means the server will intelligently combine or split shipments for cost optimization.

splitOrders.description: Whether checkout creates separate orders per store (true) or a single combined order (false).

errorSchemas.description: Standard RFC 9457-compliant error schemas for multi-store cart operations.

example.title: Max Stores Exceeded
example.detail: Cart exceeds maximum number of stores

example.title: Store Not Supported
example.detail: One or more stores are not supported in this cart
